title: Smart contract
description: An automated agreement, written in code, that tracks, verifies, and executes the binding transactions of a contract between various parties.
aliases: cardano alonzo hard fork smart contracts
when will cardano get smart contracts​
when are smart contracts coming to cardano​

props.body: The transactions of the contract are automatically executed by the smart contract code when predetermined conditions are met. Smart contracts are self executing and reliable and do not require the actions or presence of third parties. The smart contract code is stored on, and distributed across, a decentralized blockchain network, making it transparent and irreversible.
